commandLine.original:
scripts/pr-github.sh create --title "feat: add markdown to HTML rendering tool (027)" --body "This PR implements feature 027: Markdown to HTML rendering tool.

Key changes:
- Added \`Oocx.TfPlan2Md.HtmlRenderer\` console application.
- Implemented Markdig-based rendering with platform-specific post-processing (GitHub/Azure DevOps).
- Added support for wrapper templates.
- Comprehensive tests and documentation.
- Verified Docker build and demo generation.

Closes #027"

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/), and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html). ## [1.0.0-alpha.13](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/compare/v1.0.0-alpha.12...v1.0.0-alpha.13) (2026-01-01) ### Features * add html renderer tool and tests ([382ab00](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/commit/382ab008872dc09debd8cf7c01af5f2c91d17926)) * add merge conflict resolution skill ([d4ee8fa](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/commit/d4ee8fa561d6ca8cabf117d4f0557173f296440b)) * add wrapper templates and applier ([7d7bf38](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/commit/7d7bf387d365fee5c911995878410b8c2322a6a1)) ### Bug Fixes * align renderer markup with gold outputs ([eeb3fc5](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/commit/eeb3fc5e5a5bf53c7a0ad3b76809fb085ef3f904)) * **agents:** remove notebook tool references ([08fb150](https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/commit/08fb1502fb8b27e6f7cb4216272cf190b2c759c3)) [1mv1.0.0-alpha.13 [33;22mPre-release[0m [38;5;242mgithub-actions[bot] released this about 8 minutes ago [0m [38;5;252mRelease v1.0.0-alpha.13 [38;5;242mView on GitHub: https://github.com/oocx/tfplan2md/releases/tag/v1.0.0-alpha.13[0m
